author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #9335: PersistensSession should use object->getState() in all
methods rather than accessing objects properties directly.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Implemented feature request #9334: IMAP and POP3 sets can return message
numbers (method getMessageNumbers()). Patch by Mikko Koppanen.

author: as:ez.no
msg: fetchFlags() methods in IMAP. Patches by Mikko Koppanen.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #8962: "Sequence Generator" incorrect name for MySQL.
# MySQL should use the new "ezcPersistentNativeGenerator" from now, with
# auto_increment. "ezcPersistentSequenceGenerator" dispatches to this for BC
